short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View your assigned jobs from LogTrakr Mobile. Start and Stop work on your allocated jobs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View your open jobs assigned to you from http://www.logtrakr.com.

Start and stop work time for your jobs, and add and edit notes for those blocks of time.
